events.message: I am filing a claim after my car was hit in a collision on Main Street,  causing significant damage to the front bumper and headlights.
The submitted claim has been categorised under Auto Accident due to the involvement of a vehicle collision reported in the documents.
An insurance agent has been assigned to your auto accident claim to assist you with the process and answer any queries.
We acknowledge receipt of your claim related to the vehicle collision and will begin processing it promptly.
Please provide the accident police report, photos of the damage, and your vehicle registration to proceed with the investigation.
All requested documents, including the police report and vehicle photos, have been submitted successfully for your auto accident claim.
Our claims investigator has begun reviewing the submitted evidence and assessing the details of the car collision incident.
The investigation into the vehicle collision has been completed, confirming the extent of damage and liability as reported.
We propose a settlement amount to cover the repair costs and losses from the auto accident based on our assessment.
The customer has provided feedback on the proposed settlement, requesting clarification on the coverage details and next steps.
Your auto accident claim has been approved following review of all documents and investigation results.
The claim payment covering your car repairs has been issued and will be deposited to your account within two business days.
This auto accident claim has been closed successfully after payment issuance and confirmation of customer satisfaction.
The records of your vehicle collision claim have been archived in our system for future reference and compliance purposes.
